sentences.sContent: KAPLAN: Well, there's always the risk of a miscalculation or an accident at sea.
sentences.sContent_eng: KAPLAN: Well, there's always the risk of a miscalculation or an accident at sea.
sentences.sCn: 卡普兰：呃，在海上总会有误算的风险，也有发生事故的风险。

sentences.sContent: Anonymity adds to the risk that mistakes, misattribution and miscalculation will lead to military escalation—with conventional weapons or cyberarms.
sentences.sContent_eng: Anonymity adds to the risk that mistakes, misattribution and miscalculation will lead to military escalation—with conventional weapons or cyberarms.
sentences.sCn: 匿名会增加错误、错认和误算导致使用传统武器或网络武器进行军事扩张的风险。

sentences.sContent: I have made several serious suicide attempts, some laughable in their miscalculation of how many pills it would take or how deep to cut a wrist.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have made several serious suicide attempts, some laughable in their miscalculation of how many pills it would take or how deep to cut a wrist.
sentences.sCn: 我有过数次严重的自杀企图。 有点荒唐可笑，如自杀竟会误算了施药量或者割腕合适的深度。

trans.tranOther: a mistake made in deciding how long something will take to do, how much money you will need etc
